New York University    Skip to Content   Skip to Search   Skip to Sub Navigation              Global Institute of Public Health                       Search NYU                    Pages |    People                                                                Bread Crumbs          Global Institute of Public Health   /   Academic Programs   /   Master of Public Health                       Sub Navigation                                 About the MPH                       Admissions                       Academics                       Public Health Practice                       Student Resources                       Advanced Certificate in LGBT Health, Education, and Social Services                                                                 Master of Public Health                             At NYU, public health is an academic priority founded upon a longstanding history of scholarship seeking to preserve and improve the health of all people. NYU's strength in public health draws from the robust collaboration taking place across its renowned schools and colleges, fostering a truly interdisciplinary approach to addressing our most pressing global health challenges.
